pages.text: $(li)The Capsid is a block that can be used as an $(l:patchouli:decoration/quark/item_frame)Item Frame$(/l).$(br)$(li)To use it, just right click to this block while you are holding the desired block that you want to place inside it.$(br)$(li)To retrieve the item, just right click in the Capsid block again.

$(li)Some $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_void_worm)rumors$(/l) say that something will happen if you insert a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larva$(/l) into this block.
